messages.title: Take That star says Cameron is singing the right tune
messages.content: Gary Barlow backs Tory plans for a national school music competition.

messages.title: Ending the free ride for those who fail to take responsibility
messages.content: A Conservative government will create a new welfare contract with people who have responsibilities.

messages.title: Citizen Caine: Sir Michael backs Cameron’s plans for a National Citizen Service
messages.content: Sir Michael Caine has given his backing to a National Conservative plan for a National Citizen Service for Britain's teenagers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: End the free ride for those who don't take responsibility.
Plans for a National Citizen Service for Britain's teenagers.

issues.education: National school music competition endorsed by Gary Barlow.
issues.health: Let's fund new NHS cancer drugs.
issues.socialWelfare: Ending the free ride for those who fail to take responsibility.

endorsements.endorsement: Backs Tory plans for a national school music competition.
Backs Conservative plans for a National Citizen Service.

quotes.text: The heart of what's wrong with our politics is that the politicians have forgotten. We the people are the boss. That's what needs to change in our system.

images.caption: Gary Barlow with David Cameron endorsing the national school music competition.
Sir Michael Caine with David Cameron endorsing the National Citizen Service.
